info.author: Espen Moe-Nilssen
classifiers: Topic :: Software Development :: Libraries :: Python Modules
info.description:
Introduction
============
You should upgrade  Product.PloneSubSkins to version 4.7 when using subskins version newer than 4.1


Changelog
=========

4.2.3
----------
- new globalnav viewlet [espen_mn]
- new more (css) styles [espen_mn]
- css styles for mobile browsers [espen_mn]


4.2.2
----------
- fix for (new) TinyMCE [espen_mn]

4.2
----------
- fixes for photo album [espen_mn]

4.2b20
----------
- added portletmanager in the footer [espen_mn]
- changed all #content-core to #content so it styles correctly when editing in frame. [espen_mn]

4.2b19
----------
- bugfix for CSS3 footer and a few more images [espen_mn]

4.2b18
----------
- Added action and browserview ( @@cookview ) to cook portal_js and portal_css if you want to edit css and javascript without being in debug mode. [espen_mn]
- Added new globalnavs and extras  [espen_mn]

4.2b17
----------
- Added a composite.  
- Removed comments in two calendar portlets (those based on plone's). [espen_mn]

4.2b16
----------
- Some css fixes, removing media screen on composite css files and cleaning up comments.    [espen_mn]

4.2b15
----------
- Some css fixes and requiring Pillow >= 1.7.6 (see http://pypi.python.org/pypi/Pillow/1.7.6#id2 ).    [espen_mn]

4.2b13
----------
- Some more css files and a fix to taling globalnav.    [espen_mn]

4.2b12
----------
- Last release was broken.   [espen_mn] 

4.2b10
----------
- added (back again) init.py which had disappeared while moving to github.    [espen_mn]

4.2b9
----------
- Added some images and a new colophon viewlet and two new globalnavs. [espen_mn]
- Added a new portlet layout (bracket) [espen_mn]
- Added mew viewlet to show site actions only as images (no text). The name of the image is situationname + .png [espen_mn]

4.2b8
----------
- Added globalnav_talking [espen_mn]

 
4.2b7
----------
- Removed size declaration on <a> (was 11px) on text_koha and text_koha12 [espen_mn]

4.2b6
----------
- Reverted roundcolophon image, turned out it was a bug in PIL that causes the problem [espen_mn]

4.2b5
----------
Added 
- extra: drop-down-hackII.css [espen_mn]
- globalnavn: SubSkins_globalnav_dropd2.css and SubSkins_globalnav-berge.css [espen_mn]
- Small fixes to: authoring.css .actionMenu [espen_mn]

4.2b3 and 4.2b4
----------
- Added globalnavs using CSS3 with dropdown and animation [espen_mn]

4.2b2
----------
- Added "testrender" template, use it like this: http://yoursite/testrender [espen_mn]
- Fixed roundcolophon image, so it works with colorizing [espen_mn]

4.2b
----------
- Added a few new styles
- Named the rest of the css files, so they have proper names. [espen_mn]
- Included a few CSS3 globalnavs (Easingbuttons).  [espen_mn]
- Added new text selections  [espen_mn]
- Fixed some styles for login link (it was in the same color as the background) [espen_mn]
- Edited some styles for the footers and colophon [espen_mn]


4.1b7
----------
- Added styles for Accessibility elements [espen_mn]
- Added text and table css files [espen_mn]
- Named a lot of files (metadata) [espen_mn]
- Fixed hidden structure on portlet header (so it does not show when navigation portlet has no title) [espen_mn]

4.1b6
----------
- 4 new globalnavs for modern browsers [espen_mn]

4.1b5
----------
- Fixed all text css files to include style for images.  [espen_mn]
- Added composite styles. [espen_mn]
- A few changes so it works with medialog.foldersubskins [espen_mn]

4.1
----------
- Added brosho plugin - http://demos.usejquery.com/brosho-plugin/ [espen_mn]

4.0b7
----------
- Changes in #content (#content li > #content-core li etc.) [espen_mn]

4.0b6
----------
- Changed viewlet definitions etc. due to change in Plone Classic theme [espen_mn]

4.0b5
----------
- changed all "content classes" " to #content ( https://dev.plone.org/plone/ticket/10231 ) [espen_mn]
- small fixes on round corners portlets [espen_mn]

4.0b4
----------
- added two round corners portlets [espen_mn]
- added a lot of extras (grad on columns, navbackground, portletsbackground) [espen_mn]
- fixed nameing [espen_mn]
- added images  [espen_mn]
- round corners and page curl [espen_mn]

4.0b3
----------
- checked and validated all css files  [espen_mn]
- added a lot of "extra selections" to tweak site [espen_mn]
- added a few more images [espen_mn]
- added extra file "members.css" to overrule members.css while developing [espen_mn]
- Changes in control panel (Product.PloneSubSkins).  [espen_mn]
  It now includes "next" buttons to "walk through the options" [espen_mn]

4.0b2
----------
- added support for colorized images, [espen_mn]
- added another multiselct option for small tweaks [espen_mn]
- Added a lot of new layout options [espen_mn]
- Removed a lot of images that are not longer needed. [espen_mn]
- Most of selections now uses the new "colorize" option instead of images [espen_mn]

4.0
----------
medialog.subskins for plone 4 [espen_mn]
 
Changelog
=========
See README
info.keywords: web zope plone theme theming tool
info.name: medialog.subskins
info.summary: An installable theme and theming tool for Plone 4
